lead_paragraph: SHAPIRO--Blanche. The Trustees and staff of the Jewish Museum were saddened to learn of Blanche Shapiro's passing. We are grateful to Blanche and her late husband, Romie, for their longtime support of the Museum, including Romie's 34 years of service as a Trustee, and we extend our heartfelt condolences to Blanche's friends and family. Her 106 years of life were a gift to us all. Robert Pruzan, Chairman David Resnick, President Claudia Gould, Helen Goldsmith Menschel Director 1/3
